Elimination Of The Heroes Of AntiquityOrbis Temple
Destroy the Damned Heroes of Antiquity, who settled in the Temple of the Aurbis, and thereby grant them eternal rest.
Their full names: Scientist of the Aurbis, the Guardian of the Aurbis and the Thrower of the Aurbis.
Those who will contribute to their destruction, will be granted to Award a Crate of the Aurbis, and 7 characters that have achieved the best results will be awarded a Nice Prize Drawer of the Aurbis.
